name: Trials of the Buried
description:
The year is 1898. You are a lone adventurer on a journey through the desert. During your trek, you stumble upon a mysterious ruin and make it your goal to discover its secrets.

                                                                                 Credits

Programmers :  Luke Plaisance , Zachary Briggs

Artists : Keith Parker, Bryan Evans, Trinity St.Pierre

Audio : Steven Solof, Ryan Stunkel

Narration : Wayne June
